content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "white_concrete", "quantity": 51, "index": 15}, {"type": "peony", "quantity": 31, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 44, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 41}]

thought: To craft a wooden sword, I need to first craft jungle planks. To craft jungle planks, I need to place a stripped_jungle_wood in the crafting grid. I will move the stripped_jungle_wood from slot 26 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_concrete", "quantity": 51, "index": 15}, {"type": "peony", "quantity": 31, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 44, "index": 25}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 41}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the jungle planks, I can move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_concrete", "quantity": 51, "index": 15}, {"type": "peony", "quantity": 31, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 44, "index": 25}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft the wooden sword, I need to place two planks in the crafting grid, with a stick in the middle. I will move the birch plank from slot 28 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_concrete", "quantity": 51, "index": 15}, {"type": "peony", "quantity": 31, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 44, "index": 25}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I need to move one of the jungle planks to slot 4, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_concrete", "quantity": 51, "index": 15}, {"type": "peony", "quantity": 31, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 44, "index": 25}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I need to move the stick to slot 7, which is in the middle of slots 1 and 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 7 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_concrete", "quantity": 51, "index": 15}, {"type": "peony", "quantity": 31, "index": 17}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 44, "index": 25}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I can craft the wooden sword by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
